page.title: 09A day in the life of...
page.content: A Typical day for me is to get up at about 6.30.I like coffee,toast and cereals for breakfast.Sometimes after breakfast I help my dad for a bit .We have a small farm,near Hartshorne.About 8.30 I get ready to go to school.Sometimes I go on my bike but most of all I walk it takes me about 10 minutes.I play on the yard with my friends until the bell goes.Here is my time table for a typical day: 9.00 Bell 9.05 Register 9.15 Assembly 9.45 Maths or language 10.40 Bell for playtime 11.00 Back in class for maths or language (next page)
